alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Elliott; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Magoffin; Morgan; Rowan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:08PM EDT until June 17 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Morgan County in southeastern Kentucky... Western Johnson County in northeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Knott County in southeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Floyd County in southeastern Kentucky... Northern Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... Magoffin County in southeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Rowan County in east central Kentucky... Eastern Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... Southwestern Elliott County in east central Kentucky... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 108 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Steele to Portsmouth, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Press around 115 PM EDT. Moon around 125 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Mima, Buck, Win and Elmrock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Elliott; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Magoffin; Morgan; Rowan; Wolfe
